naslov: Kaštela // MODERNA VILA S PANORAMSKIM POGLEDOM NA MORE -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju je ekskluzivna moderna vila, prizemnica novije gradnje (2020. godina), smještena između Kaštel Štafilića i Kaštel Novog, na uzvisini poviše Magistrale. Ova jedinstvena nekretnina pruža potpuni mir i intimu, idealnu za opušten život ili odmor, a udaljena je samo 1400 metara od mora. Karakteristike vile: + Površina zemljišta: 1000 m2 + Ukupna stambena površina: 193 m2 (dva odvojena objekta) + Panoramski pogled na more i otoke + Kompletno opremljena i namještena s vrhunskim brendovima, dizajnirana od strane renomiranog arhitekta GLAVNI OBJEKT (126 m2) sadrži: - Dvije prostrane spavaće sobe, dva moderno uređena kupatila, prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, izlaz na natkrivenu terasu s direktnim pristupom bazenu SUSJEDNI OBJEKT / pogodan za 'gostinjsku kućicu) (67 m2) sadrži: - Dvije dodatne spavaće sobe sa dvije kupaonice, praonicu Dodatne pogodnosti: - Mogućnost uređenja 'roof terrace' s otvorenim pogledom na more i otoke - Uređena okućnica s mediteranskim biljem - Prostor za bočanje i druženje - Privatnost i mir u prirodnom okruženju Ova luksuzna vila nudi savršenu kombinaciju modernog dizajna, komfora i prirodne ljepote. Idealna je kako za stanovanje, tako i za investiciju u turizam. - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. - NAPOMENA: detaljne slike, video, te lokaciju, šaljemo isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor ENG -------------------------------------------------------- For sale is an exclusive modern villa, a single-storey house of recent construction (2020), located between Kaštel Štafilić and Kaštel Novi, on a hill above the Magistrala. This unique property offers complete peace and privacy, ideal for a relaxed life or vacation, and is only 1400 meters from the sea. Characteristics of the villa: + Land area: 1000 m2 + Total living area: 193 m2 (two separate buildings) + Panoramic view of the sea and islands + Fully equipped and furnished with top brands, designed by a renowned architect MAIN FACILITY (126 m2) contains: - Two spacious bedrooms, two modern bathrooms, spacious living room with kitchen and dining room, exit to a covered terrace with direct access to the pool NEIGHBORING BUILDING / suitable for 'guest house') (67 m2) contains: - Two additional bedrooms with two bathrooms, laundry room Additional benefits: - The possibility of arranging a 'roof terrace' with an open view of the sea and the islands - Landscaped garden with Mediterranean plants - Space for bowling and socializing - Privacy and peace in a natural environment This luxury villa offers a perfect combination of modern design, comfort and natural beauty. It is ideal both for housing and for investment in tourism. - sale of #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. - NOTE: we send detailed pictures, video, and location only with a signed mediation contract #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
